Description: Required Skills to be successful•   Commercial acumen, clear strategic thinking, and ability to create buy-in and influence at a senior level .•   Strong data analytical, evaluation and interpretation skills, including P&L & good business acumen.•   Target oriented and drive to exceed demanding challenges.•   Stakeholder management skills with the ability to communicate and interact with officials at all levels .•   Strong communication and interpersonal skills able to drive best practices and productivity.About the TeamYou will work in Global Aftersales Business unit in planning job function and reporting to Head of Planning and Performance. What equips you for the role •   Business degree .•   Strong Microsoft Office skills, especially in Excel•   ERP experience (SAP IS AUTO)•   Working knowledge of BI reporting attributes.•   Expert knowledge of and experience in the automotive after-sales industry is essential.•   At least 3-5 years of experience at an Automotive industry.Job Details
